spec_data.Name: xapian-core-devel
spec_data.Description:
Xapian is an Open Source Probabilistic Information Retrieval framework. It
offers a highly adaptable toolkit that allows developers to easily add advanced
indexing and search facilities to applications. This package provides the
files needed for building packages which use Xapian
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 11:58:33 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Files needed for building packages which use Xapian
